net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler

类 Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
  • 直接已知子类:
    AnvilUpdateEvent, BabyEntitySpawnEvent, BiomeEvent, BlockEvent, ChunkGeneratorEvent, ChunkWatchEvent, ClientChatEvent, ClientChatReceivedEvent, ColorHandlerEvent, CommandEvent, ConfigChangedEvent, DecorateBiomeEvent, DifficultyChangeEvent, DrawBlockHighlightEvent, EnchantmentLevelSetEvent, EntityEvent, EntityViewRenderEvent, ExplosionEvent, FluidEvent, FluidRegistry.FluidRegisterEvent, FMLNetworkEvent, FMLNetworkEvent.CustomNetworkEvent, ForgeChunkManager.ForceChunkEvent, ForgeChunkManager.UnforceChunkEvent, FOVUpdateEvent, FurnaceFuelBurnTimeEvent, GameRuleChangeEvent, GenericEvent, GuiContainerEvent, GuiOpenEvent, GuiScreenEvent, InitMapGenEvent, InputEvent, LootTableLoadEvent, MerchantTradeOffersEvent, ModelBakeEvent, ModelRegistryEvent, MouseEvent, OreDictionary.OreRegisterEvent, OreGenEvent, PlayerEvent, PotionBrewEvent, RegistryEvent.NewRegistry, RenderBlockOverlayEvent, RenderGameOverlayEvent, RenderHandEvent, RenderItemInFrameEvent, RenderLivingEvent, RenderSpecificHandEvent, RenderTooltipEvent, RenderWorldLastEvent, ScreenshotEvent, ServerChatEvent, SoundEvent, TextureStitchEvent, TickEvent, VillageSiegeEvent, WorldEvent, WorldTypeEvent

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Base Event class that all other events are derived from

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ListenerList getListenerList()
      Returns a ListenerList object that contains all listeners that are registered to this event.
      EventPriority getPhase() 
      Event.Result getResult()
      Returns the value set as the result of this event
      boolean hasResult()
      Determines if this event expects a significant result value.
      boolean isCancelable()
      Determine if this function is cancelable at all.
      boolean isCanceled()
      Determine if this event is canceled and should stop executing.
      void setCanceled(boolean cancel)
      Sets the cancel state of this event.
      void setPhase(EventPriority value) 
      void setResult(Event.Result value)
      Sets the result value for this event, not all events can have a result set, and any attempt to set a result for a event that isn't expecting it will result in a IllegalArgumentException.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Event

        public Event()

    • 方法详细资料

      • isCancelable

        public boolean isCancelable()
        Determine if this function is cancelable at all.
        返回:
        If access to setCanceled should be allowed Note: Events with the Cancelable annotation will have this method automatically added to return true.

      • isCanceled

        public boolean isCanceled()
        Determine if this event is canceled and should stop executing.
        返回:
        The current canceled state

      • setCanceled

        public void setCanceled(boolean cancel)
        Sets the cancel state of this event. Note, not all events are cancelable, and any attempt to invoke this method on an event that is not cancelable (as determined by isCancelable() will result in an UnsupportedOperationException. The functionality of setting the canceled state is defined on a per-event bases.
        参数:
        cancel - The new canceled value

      • hasResult

        public boolean hasResult()
        Determines if this event expects a significant result value. Note: Events with the HasResult annotation will have this method automatically added to return true.

      • getResult

        public Event.Result getResult()
        Returns the value set as the result of this event

      • setResult

        public void setResult(Event.Result value)
        Sets the result value for this event, not all events can have a result set, and any attempt to set a result for a event that isn't expecting it will result in a IllegalArgumentException. The functionality of setting the result is defined on a per-event bases.
        参数:
        value - The new result

      • getListenerList

        public ListenerList getListenerList()
        Returns a ListenerList object that contains all listeners that are registered to this event.
        返回:
        Listener List

      • getPhase

        public EventPriority getPhase()

      • setPhase

        public void setPhase(EventPriority value)
